sentences.sContent: One way to avoid all this is to make a list of simple values that you want to incorporate into your next career.
sentences.sContent_eng: One way to avoid all this is to make a list of simple values that you want to incorporate into your next career.
sentences.sCn: 避免所有这些的一个办法是，列个清单，列出你想要融入到下一份职业中的简单的价值观念。
